alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Kaufman; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 6:11PM CDT until April 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN KAUFMAN...SOUTHWESTERN VAN ZANDT AND NORTH CENTRAL HENDERSON COUNTIES... At 611 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northeast of Kemp, or 12 miles west of Canton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Canton, Wills Point, Mabank, Kemp, Purtis Creek State Park, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Myrtle Springs, Rand, Whitton, Becker, Phalba, Roddy, Jackson, Oakland, Wise, Walton, Prairieville, Tundra, Martins Mill and Colfax. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
